      • commandLineFromBmpToWtf

        public static void commandLineFromBmpToWtf(java.lang.String[] args)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        If the program is run from the command line and has three arguments, this method will be called. It transforms a bmp-file to a wtf-file.
        Parameters:
        args[0] - level of loss of the transform, 0 is lossless.
        args[1] - The (path and) name of the bmp file to be tranformed.
        args[2] - The (path and) name of the wtf file to which the tranformed data will be saved.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • commandLineSeries

        public static void commandLineSeries(java.lang.String[] args)
                              throws java.io.IOException
        Transforms a picture to a series of wtf files with different leveles of loss.
        Parameters:
        args[0] - The smallest level of loss
        args[1] - The biggest level of loss
        args[2] - The image to be transformed.
        args[3] - The start of the name of the generated wtf files. The names of the files will be args[3]+i+".wtf", where i is the level of the loss.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • commandLineInverseSeries

        public static void commandLineInverseSeries(java.lang.String[] args)
                                     throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        Transforms a series of wtf files into bmps. This is invese to the mehtod commandLineSeries. The numbers in arguments don't really have to be the real levels of loss, they are used only to identify the files to be converted.
        Parameters:
        args[0] - = "inverse"
        args[1] - The smallest level of loss (actually, the number in the name).
        args[2] - The biggest level of loss (actually, the number in the name).
        args[4] - First part of the name of the object files. The final names will be args[4]+i+".bmp", where i is the level of loss.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • commandLineFromWtfToBmp

        public static void commandLineFromWtfToBmp(java.lang.String[] args)
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                           java.io.IOException
        If the program is run from the command line and has three arguments, this mehtod will be called. It transfroms a wtf-file to a bmp-file.
        Parameters:
        args[0] - The wtf-file to be transformed.
        args[1] - The resulting bmp-file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • printHelp

        public static void printHelp()
        Prints the help text.
